data.title: The Garlic Burger is No joke
data.text: I love Garlic. But this burger will kill everything living in a five mile radius. I Absolutely love their skinny seasoned fries. I love going here. (Parking isn't the best.)

data.title: A mixed bag
data.text: Place wasn't real attractive, the floor was sticky with spilled beer and we were stared at when we entered this local watering hole. The server was nice and gave several recommendations. I had one of the chubby sandwiches,  it was very good, a little greasy.  My wife had the shrimp and said it was good also.

data.title: Not worth driving across town
data.text: The food is ordinary, the atmosphere is typical neighborhood sports bar, but the creativity of the Chubby Burger is interesting - a burger between two grilled cheese sandwiches.  It turns out to be four slices of bread, two slices of cheese and a burger.  Uninspired Greek salad - a total of one cherry tomato, but cut in half so maybe I was to think it was plentiful.

data.title: Great Friends Hang Out.
data.text: OMG, TRY THE CHUBBY! Unlike most beer joints, the food is good Before the pitcher of beer. This place has great food even without drinking. Beer is good as well. Fun small town feel.

user_location.name: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

data.title: Good Food, Great Atmosphere
data.text: Fun, locally owner pub with great food and nice atmosphere.  Lots of menu choices and they are flexible with orders.  Wait staff is great, they are like family there and they have a large number of regulars that know each other and the staff, but they still make a first timer feel welcome.  You won't be sorry you went!

data.title: I've never had a bad meal here.
data.text: My new favorite here is the fish and chips.  The fries are always excellent and wonderfully seasoned, and they use salmon for the fish.  I nice change of pace.  (A little bit of coleslaw would be a nice addition, but haven't seen it offered.)  Always interesting brews on tap.

data.title: The Best!
data.text: Copper Creek is my favorite! Never had a bad meal. The food is all amazing! The "Chubby" is definitely one of a kind! Everyone has to try Copper Creek at least once. Otherwise you are missing out.

data.title: Our favorite
data.text: We love to come here each trip to SLC. Service is always with a smile and very good. The pub steak is so good!! Veggies are always perfect. Then the fries yummy. Fry sauce omg delish! Will be back next week!!

data.title: Not up to par.
data.text: Food was mediocre at best and the service was horrible.  We will not be back.  If you want quality food and service go somewhere else.

data.title: Bleh
data.text: The first thing to know about Utah, is that "Pub" is code for bar that serves food. Not being a native Utahn, I forget this. Copper Creek is just that, a bar that serves food, really nothing else to say to describe it. My husband and I went there for lunch one day thinking that we would try some place new. I got a chubby burger that was basically charbroiled leather. I had to drown it in ketchup to cover the disgusting burnt taste. I ended up leaving half on the plate. My husband's meal was at least edible, but he said not great. The service was okay. Really nothing remarkable about it either good or bad, just acceptable. Perhaps, we just went on an off day, but we definitely will not be back.

data.title: Hit the spot
data.text: On our trip to move our Daughter and son-in-law to Arizona, we picked Copper creek.  Was worth it.  Good beer choices and food was exactly what we needed after 8 hours of driving!

data.title: Great Place for a Bite to Eat & to catch the Game
data.text: One of my favorite things to do when finding somewhere to eat is to look for random local places to get me away from the chain restaurants or fast food joints.  Copper Creek is one such place that has a great feel to it.  Its a hole in the wall in a strip mall off 5600 W in West Valley.  I personally love going here for lunch because they have great deals for great prices and you get a great amount of food.  Everything tastes fresh and delicious.  I have really enjoyed their Club Sandwich and their French Dip.  Both of those are my favorites and order them often.  I would highly recommend this place to others looking to try something new and different in West Valley.

data.title: Better Than It Looks
data.text: We had a party of 4 on a Sunday afternoon. We had just arrived in town for an overnight stay, and were looking for something convenient to our hotel. I selected Coppercreek based on online reviews and it's proximity to our lodging. It was a little hard to find, because it is in a strip shopping center set back off the road behind some other fast food restaurants. When we drove up, we were a little uncertain about going in because there were several motorcycles parked out front and there were beer posters and neon plastered over the front door and windows. When we went in, it looked like a neighborhood bar. The bar is the prominent feature, and there were some folks seated there on stools chatting with the bartender and watching sports on one of several TVs. It's a small place, and there is a pool table in there, so there aren't a lot of tables. Fortunately, they weren't very busy. The server was very friendly and brought us menus and drinks right away. We were pleased to see that they had a wide variety of choices on the menu. We ordered several things, including a couple of appetizers, and everything was good. The portions were generous - we couldn't eat it all. The prices were reasonable, too. Bottomline: it's a very casual sports bar with good food.

data.title: Great little hole in the wall
data.text: Love this place- great food and great prices. Try the steaks, and be sure to bring your appetite! a lot of food for the money.  Even though it is a pub, and looks like a beer bar, most people there are there for the food (at least around dinner time). It has a good kids menu and a good selection. Only wish they would bring back the ribs!

data.title: Best food EVER!!
data.text: Seriously incredible food!!  I don't normally write reviews, but no matter what I have ordered, it has always been amazing! My favorites are The Blue and Bacon Burger and The Full Monte Cristo! I ordered that on a dare and it blew my mind!  The service is great and so are the drinks. Whenever I go in, I feel like I am part of the family!

data.title: Moderate at Best
data.text:
The Copper Creek Pub and Grub has a selection of food that is greasy certaint not healthy and not particularly tasty.
The service was good and there was a reasonable selection of drinks.
If you only want a beer this place is okay (however you have to eat something it is apparently the law).

data.title: Food barely edible
data.text: We ordered appetizer plate with mild wings that were so spiced we could not eat them.  The chicken dish tasted like cardboard. The kids menu said all kids meal came with a side, but then they charged for a side dish with the Mac and cheese.  I would not go there again.

data.title: Good Service,Great Food and Selection
data.text: This is what is termed "a hole in the wall" It is in West Valley off 5600 west behind Taco Bell. Always clean, good service and a very diverse menu from appetizers to entrees, also have salads,sandwiches and speciality items such as Copper Bomb and Chubby Burger

data.title: Food and drinks
data.text: The drinks were decently priced, food was pretty big portions, and the service/atmosphere was juice. I did notice that there were a lot of extra dollar charges for stuff we thought were included and there was nothing said about these up sells.

data.title: Food was delicious.
data.text: Copper Creek pub was a great choice for a pre-hockey game meal. The only real draw back was the service was r e a l l y slow.  Once we got the food everybody  was quite impressed . I ordered spicy buffalo chicken sandwich, itsuprised me on how spicy and good it was. The fries had this amazing seasoning on them, put all other fries to shame. The fried cheese curds were so-so but the fried cucumbers were great. One of the individuals in my party had the spicy chubby and LOVED it.  Good place to eat when you're not in a hurry.
